topics.body:
Once I get a PS4 and my driver's license, my life would start being exciting again.

Ever since school ended, all I do is mope around and use my computer or TV. My house is pretty secluded so I can't go anywhere without a car and the neighbourhood is so quiet I call it a ghost town. I don't have friends who live nearby and even if I have the means of transportation, I have no idea where they live. The only ways of communicating with them would be through my phone or computer.

I'm stuck in my house with only a computer, television and Internet.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
